extendedInfo.description: Firstmonie is the official mobile banking and mobile money app from First Bank of Nigeria.Firstmonie is the fast, safe and convenient mobile financial service from First Bank. This app lets you send and receive money, buy airtime, make purchases and pay bills all from your mobile phone with or without a bank account.Set-up for a new Firstmonie account-  Select âRegisterâ to register for Firstmonie (the self-registration process is in matter of minutes)-  On completion of the registration, you will receive an SMS on the registered phone number containing a Confirmation Code. Enter the code received and PIN in the App and click on Activate button. If you do not receive the Confirmation Code after 30minutes, click on the Resend Code button.-  Upon successful activation, the transaction menu is displayed. -  Fund your account and start transacting. Every transaction will require your PIN to authorize.Set-up for existing Firstmonie customerNOTE: Before you use the app, please, refer to the âGET CHANNELâ section below.-  Select Activate, enter the required details-  On completion of the Activation, you will receive an SMS on the activated phone number. Enter the code received and PIN in the App and click on Activate button. If you do not receive the confirmation code after 30minutes, click on the Resend Code.-  Upon successful activation, the transaction menu is displayed. Set-up for First Bank account holders NOTE: Visit any First Bank branch and complete the Mobile Banking form (Indicate âMobile Appâ channel access on the form). Upon successful registration at the branch, refer to âGet Channelâ section below before you download the app. Request for the exact details used as your surname, motherâs maiden name and date birth, as they will be required to configure the Mobile App on your phone/device.- Select Activate, enter the required details- On completion of the Activation, you will receive an SMS on the activated phone number. Enter the code received and PIN in the App and click on Activate button. If you do not receive the confirmation code after 30minutes, click on the Resend Code.- Upon successful activation, the transaction menu is displayed. Benefits of the serviceWith the Firstmonie app you can do the following via your mobile wallet or bank account: * Send/Receive Money to any mobile phone (whether registered on Firstmonie or not), FirstBank account or other bank account* Buy Airtime for your phone or other phone* Withdraw Money at ATM, Firstmonie agent or FirstBank Branch* Pay Bills * Shopping at Firstmonie merchant i.e. shops, restaurants and supermarkets * Money Transfer between linked accounts* Check Balance or mobile wallet balance or bank account balance* Manage Accounts-  Manage mobile wallet account i.e. Mini statements, -  Change PIN-  Access other channels-  SettingsOther information:You can fund your mobile wallet through any of the following ways:-  At any Firstmonie agent (from your nearest Firstmonie agent). -  At any First Bank ATM machine -  Directly from your First Bank account using your mobile phone. Activating Firstmonie App: By downloading the Firstmonie App you agree to be bound by the license agreement which can be found at https://www.firstmonie.com . If you do not agree to the license agreement, do not download or use this application. Helpdesk:Tel: 0700Firstmonie (07003477866643) Email: firstmonie@firstbanknigeria.comTwitter: @FirstmonieGet ChannelThis process is to guide you on how to add the Mobile App channel to your existing *894# ussd channel following the steps below;-  Dial *894#-  Select 1 for Firstmonie-  Select 8 for Firstmonie Services-  Select 3 for Activate channel-  Select 3 for mobile app -  Enter your 5 digits PIN to authenticate the process-  Upon success, proceed to download the Mobile App and setup on your phone/device

reviews.title: Isnt working
reviews.comment: Cant log on. Getting all the errors known to man .
reviews.author: Rhona Okardi

reviews.title: Perenial server error
reviews.comment: A nightmare to use. 99.99% of the time I get \"Server error\" when I want to buy airtime credit. In frustration I wanted to move my money back to my linked account, it would not let me move N10,000. But it allowed me move N10,000 from the linked account to Firstmonie!
reviews.author: Raphael Awoseyin

reviews.title: A little improvement needed
reviews.comment: The latest update allows one to do some Mobile Banking transactions via our First bank accounts.  This is brilliant! One should be able to transact directly using our first bank accounts if we have one. And none First Bank customers should be able to use the mobile money wallet app for their transactions. Looking forward to checking my  *First bank account balance. *First bank account Transaction history.  *Pay utility bills from my First bank account directly instead of going through Mobile Money protocols
reviews.author: Sidney Osahon

reviews.title: Can\'t be used from another country
reviews.author: frank chris

reviews.title: It\'s the best naija mobile money app you can imagine.
reviews.comment: Perfect mobile banking experience, its absolutely worth downloading.
reviews.author: chijioke ifeanyichukwu

reviews.title: Not impressed
reviews.comment: Can\'t check balance and load from my account. Previous version better
reviews.author: Funmilayo Makinde

reviews.title: Good begining
reviews.comment: I like the user interface. Friendly n convinient. Good work
reviews.author: david favor

reviews.title: Below average
reviews.comment: Older version was better, updated version is just useless
reviews.author: nkem nkemdirim

reviews.title: Lovely
reviews.comment: Superb App....Very fast....Very convenient..Good work Firstbank
reviews.author: Bejide Richard

reviews.title: Can\'t Login
reviews.comment: Keep getting PIN/login error 0100 i.e. \"user does not have access...\" I\'ve successfully done a PIN reset with Helpdesk and I still can\'t login
reviews.author: James-Adeyinka Shorungbe

reviews.title: Promise Unfulfilled
reviews.comment: I have registered & activated my firstmonie account but I am yet to receive N100 & N240 in my mobile wallet & airtime bonus respectively. Secondly, do I have to get to the bank to link my account number to the app?
reviews.author: Tee Show

reviews.title: Sleek & Convinient
reviews.comment: I love this App! Its so user friendly! Looks and Feels good too.
reviews.author: Jide Aboderin

reviews.title: Best monie app
reviews.comment: This app helps me make all my mini transactions Just dial *894# nigeria only.....@GboruM
reviews.author: Markson Oyinmiebi
